attributes.action: Renationalise the Railways, and look after the public interests, NOT the Multinationals'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current situation for railway commuters and taxpayers is truly remarkable.

At this time, the Government is spending more on subsidising the railway network, then when it was under public ownership.

Millions of pounds have been squandered on PR stunts, such as deciding on a name, as opposed to the simple, classy, unpretentious name of "British Rail"

We urge the Prime Minister to stop dithering over issues like "how can we attract investment?" and be a Labour Government, and do what is best for us.

Even Thatcher called the Railways Privatisation "one Privatisation too far"
